ready-construction.title: Ready Construction
ready-construction.description: Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) provides innovative solutions in ready construction using the latest modern technologies. We specialize in two leading techniques: sandwich panel systems and fiber cement construction, making us pioneers in fast and sustainable building. The sandwich panel technique uses composite panels consisting of two metal layers with an internal insulating layer that provides excellent thermal and acoustic insulation properties and moisture resistance. While the fiber cement technique relies on cement reinforced with synthetic or natural fibers to provide additional strength and excellent resistance to climatic factors. Our advantages include speed of completion, cost savings, high quality, excellent resistance to moisture and fire, design flexibility, environmental sustainability, and lightweight that reduces foundation costs. We provide integrated service from design to implementation with the highest technical standards.

regular-construction.title: Regular Construction
regular-construction.description: Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) places great importance on regular concrete construction as one of the vital foundations in our construction projects. Regular concrete is one of the most widely used materials in construction work due to its durability, economic cost, and ease of molding. We execute all types of work related to regular concrete in foundations, floors, and barriers according to the highest quality and safety standards. We rely on specialized technical expertise and precise implementation techniques that ensure high load resistance and long-term stability for structures. Our services include preparing concrete mixes according to technical specifications, implementing foundations for residential and commercial buildings, pouring concrete floors for warehouses and industrial facilities, building concrete walls and fences, and ensuring quality through periodic inspections. We believe that excellent construction begins with a solid foundation.

renewable-energy.title: Renewable Energy
renewable-energy.description: Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) seeks to contribute effectively to sustainable development by providing integrated solutions in solar and renewable energy that suit various residential, commercial, and industrial needs. We offer advanced systems including continuous energy systems that ensure permanent electrical energy flow by integrating solar panels with the electricity grid, dual energy systems that combine solar and electrical energy, in addition to evening energy systems, stored energy systems, and smart solar poles. We rely on a specialized technical and engineering team and modern technologies to ensure the highest efficiency levels, with preliminary technical studies to determine the most suitable solutions for each project. We provide our clients with a sustainable and smart choice to achieve energy independence and reduce operational costs.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) seeks to expand its interventions in the agricultural sector by offering innovative agricultural services and modern irrigation technologies that meet the aspirations of investors and farmers. We provide integrated and sustainable solutions including design and implementation of agricultural projects from land preparation to harvest, soil and climate studies to determine the most suitable crops, and supply and installation of modern irrigation systems according to the highest standards. We also offer smart solutions to rationalize water consumption and increase agricultural productivity, in addition to training and field support of agricultural teams to ensure project success and sustainability. We specialize in the latest irrigation technologies including drip irrigation systems, sprinkler systems, subsurface irrigation, and smart irrigation using sensors and mobile applications.

animal-development.title: Animal Development
animal-development.description:
Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) pays increasing attention to the field of animal development, considering it a fundamental pillar for food security and sustainable rural development. The company has developed a comprehensive package of integrated and innovative services, targeting support for producers and investors in the livestock sector and facilitating production and marketing chains.

The company's interventions include:
• Feed cultivation and agricultural sprouting development: Adopting the latest technologies in green feed cultivation (such as sprouted barley) to provide rich, high-quality nutrition for animals, while reducing costs and achieving environmental sustainability.
• Building barns and veterinary facilities: Designing and constructing modern barns with specifications that ensure health and nutritional comfort for animals, with the possibility of equipping them with automatic ventilation and cooling systems, and dedicated sections for treatment and care.
• Fattening and livestock breeding projects: Establishing integrated fattening units for cattle, sheep, and camels, under veterinary and engineering supervision that ensures the highest production rates.
• Consulting and training services: Providing technical and technological support to breeders and farmers through consultations and training courses, to spread modern and sustainable practices in livestock management.

entrepreneurship-center.title: Entrepreneurship Center
entrepreneurship-center.description: CAC provides specialized training programs and workshops in entrepreneurship and innovation, aiming to support entrepreneurs and develop startup projects.

conference-hall.title: Conference Hall
conference-hall.description: CAC provides conference hall rental and management services, with all equipment and services required for hosting conferences and seminars.

charitable-interventions.title: Charitable Interventions
charitable-interventions.description:
Based on its deep belief in social responsibility and pioneering role in community service, Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) places great importance on charitable and developmental work, continuously supporting humanitarian and social initiatives that improve lives and promote solidarity values.

The company's Scientific Council serves as an effective intellectual and advisory arm in this field, overseeing the guidance and evaluation of charitable interventions according to a balanced scientific vision that ensures sustainable impact and initiative quality.

Through this council, the company seeks to identify intervention priorities based on studies and community needs, whether in education, health, orphan sponsorship, supporting needy families, or participating in developmental projects with preventive and strategic character.

CAC commits to documenting partnerships with charitable sector actors and ensures implementing initiatives according to transparency, effectiveness, and sustainability principles, aligning with its institutional mission that combines economic success with societal advancement.

solar-energy.title: Solar Energy
solar-energy.description: CAC specializes in providing comprehensive renewable energy consulting and innovative solar solutions. We offer specialized consulting in solar energy systems and sustainable energy solutions, including automatic backup electrical systems (hybrid systems), direct solar power systems for daily use, 24/7 continuous systems for round-the-clock energy storage, and dual systems combining multiple energy sources for optimal efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: CAC provides specialized agricultural consulting and advanced economic solutions, including feed farm development, modern irrigation systems, and drip irrigation systems. We offer consulting on innovative agricultural systems including modern cultivation and maturation processes that provide economical and high-quality food production solutions.

AboutUs.PresentationduGroupeCAC: Presentation of Contemporary Artistic Construction - CAC
AboutUs.CenterforEntrepreneurship: Contemporary Artistic Construction (CAC) is a multidisciplinary company specializing in construction, development, solutions, and services, focusing on public health and authentic education.
AboutUs.CompanyType: Type: Multidisciplinary company in construction, development, solutions, and services
AboutUs.CompanyLocation: Location: Sheikh Zayed Street / Tevragh Zeina
AboutUs.CompanyVision: We strive to be pioneers in providing comprehensive and integrated solutions in construction, energy, and sustainable development, based on innovation and knowledge to serve the community and achieve comprehensive development.
AboutUs.CompanyMission: We provide specialized and integrated services with the highest quality and professionalism standards, combining practical experience with future vision to support infrastructure and economic and social development.
AboutUs.ExperienceDescription: We are a specialized multidisciplinary company, seeking to provide integrated solutions that keep pace with development and meet the needs of the local and international market efficiently and with high quality, through a professional work team and extensive scientific experience.
AboutUs.Service1Description: For regular construction, we provide all construction services from regular concrete. We execute construction projects using the latest modern and contemporary techniques using ready construction systems, ensuring quality and speed of completion for both regular and ready systems. We also specialize in building caravans, ready-made houses, and guard rooms.
AboutUs.Service2Description: Design and implementation of solar energy systems, whether backup energy, continuous energy, partial energy, or shared energy between systems (wind, electrical, solar, and generators) for electricity generation with installation and maintenance services.
AboutUs.Service3Description: In the agricultural field: Agricultural development, agricultural sprouting, fodder cultivation, latest irrigation methods (drip-pivot-sprinklers). In animal development: Building modern barns, development and fattening.
AboutUs.Service4Description: Entrepreneurship Center - Mon Excellence Hall for organizing conferences, forums, and seminars to the highest professional standards.
AboutUs.Service5Title: Structural and Strategic Solutions for Development
AboutUs.Service5Description: Providing scientific solutions to development challenges through specialized strategic studies.
AboutUs.Service6Description: We supervise a scientific council for charitable works, which works to guide and support humanitarian initiatives according to sustainable scientific standards.
AboutUs.Projet1: Construction of mining centers in Mauritania, Somelec, Radio Mauritania, Land Transport Administration, National Gendarmerie, Road Safety, Public Transport, Tanit Port, Sweed Organization, People's Bank of Mauritania, TAAZOUR, Fish Marketing Company, Sogeco, Ministry of Sanitation, Ministry of Health and National Security, TDM Broadcasting and Television Company, and KENZ Mining Company.
AboutUs.Projet2: As for the private sector, we have established water and plastic factories and built a large number of warehouses, halls, dwellings, and mobile premises.
AboutUs.Projet3: CAC specializes in renewable energy consulting with comprehensive solar energy solutions including 24/7 continuous systems, backup power (hybrid), and daily energy powered by sunlight. We have implemented several successful projects in this field.
AboutUs.ProjetsEnergie: It also has several projects implemented in this field.
AboutUs.EtudesDescription: CAC provides consulting services in project studies, monitoring, and planning with specialized personnel and logistics equipment including:
AboutUs.Vehicules: And vehicles, cars, trucks, and tractors as well.
AboutUs.CACAGRO: CAC specializes in agricultural consulting and livestock development services.
AboutUs.CACAGRODescription: CAC has implemented several successful agricultural consulting projects, delivering tangible results in various regions since 2015. We provide consulting on innovative agricultural systems including modern cultivation and maturation processes that offer economical and high-quality food production solutions.
AboutUs.CACSecuriteDescription: CAC provides safety consulting services including workplace safety assessments, safety equipment recommendations, and safety protocol development for various industries.
AboutUs.CACOfficeDescription: CAC provides comprehensive office consulting services including workspace design, layout optimization, meeting room planning, and office equipment recommendations. We offer professional consulting for modern office environments that enhance productivity and efficiency.
